text: Otakar Krámský (1 July 1959 - 25 April 2015) was a Czech hillclimbing racecar driver. He began his career during the early 1970s. He won three European Hill Climb Championship. Krámský died after his racecar crashed during a race in Styria, Austria, aged 55. ==Other websites== * Oficial website Category:1959 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Czech sportspeople Category:Deaths in sport
title: Otakar Krámský
